marklogic.body: Oh no, you mis-understood me. Politicians work this way. A pure economist would start raising the flag about Overheating but that won't happen until after November. This economy is hotter than anyone thinks. The numbers coming out for the next few month will be good. I put america first not any party. I am an independent and Glad to be one. When books get written in the future both Geitner and Bernanke will be treated as heroes. People do not realize how bad things were in Nov 2008 by design to avoid panick. What those guys did was look the devil in the eye and did not flinch. They are truly American Heros
